mapper.select: SELECT T3.*, T4.englishName AS countryName FROM (SELECT T1.*, COUNT(T2.areaNumber) AS count FROM areaTable AS T1 LEFT JOIN bookmarkTable AS T2 ON T1.areaNumber = T2.areaNumber GROUP BY T1.areaNumber) AS T3 LEFT JOIN countryTable AS T4 ON T3.countryNumber = T4.countryNumber ORDER BY T3.count DESC LIMIT 3;
